Package org.elasticsearch.client

Class CcrClient

java.lang.Object
org.elasticsearch.client.CcrClient
public final class CcrClient
extends java.lang.Object
A wrapper for the RestHighLevelClient that provides methods for accessing the Elastic ccr related methods

See the X-Pack Rollup APIs on elastic.co for more information.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AcknowledgedResponse deleteAutoFollowPattern​(DeleteAutoFollowPatternRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options)
    Deletes an auto follow pattern.
    org.elasticsearch.client.Cancellable deleteAutoFollowPatternAsync​(DeleteAutoFollowPatternRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options, org.elasticsearch.action.ActionListener<AcknowledgedResponse> listener)
    Asynchronously deletes an auto follow pattern.
    BroadcastResponse forgetFollower​(ForgetFollowerRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options)
    Instructs an index acting as a leader index to forget the specified follower index.
    org.elasticsearch.client.Cancellable forgetFollowerAsync​(ForgetFollowerRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options, org.elasticsearch.action.ActionListener<BroadcastResponse> listener)
    Asynchronously instructs an index acting as a leader index to forget the specified follower index.

    Asynchronously gets an auto follow pattern.

    Gets all CCR stats.

    Asynchronously gets all CCR stats.

    AcknowledgedResponse pauseAutoFollowPattern​(PauseAutoFollowPatternRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options)
    Pauses an auto follow pattern.

    Asynchronously pauses an auto follow pattern.
    AcknowledgedResponse pauseFollow​(PauseFollowRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options)
    Instructs a follower index to pause the following of a leader index.
    org.elasticsearch.client.Cancellable pauseFollowAsync​(PauseFollowRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options, org.elasticsearch.action.ActionListener<AcknowledgedResponse> listener)
    Asynchronously instruct a follower index to pause the following of a leader index.

    Stores an auto follow pattern.
    org.elasticsearch.client.Cancellable putAutoFollowPatternAsync​(PutAutoFollowPatternRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options, org.elasticsearch.action.ActionListener<AcknowledgedResponse> listener)
    Asynchronously stores an auto follow pattern.
    PutFollowResponse putFollow​(PutFollowRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options)
    Executes the put follow api, which creates a follower index and then the follower index starts following the leader index.
    org.elasticsearch.client.Cancellable putFollowAsync​(PutFollowRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options, org.elasticsearch.action.ActionListener<PutFollowResponse> listener)
    Asynchronously executes the put follow api, which creates a follower index and then the follower index starts following the leader index.
    AcknowledgedResponse resumeAutoFollowPattern​(ResumeAutoFollowPatternRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options)
    Resumes an auto follow pattern.
    org.elasticsearch.client.Cancellable resumeAutoFollowPatternAsync​(ResumeAutoFollowPatternRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options, org.elasticsearch.action.ActionListener<AcknowledgedResponse> listener)
    Asynchronously resumes an auto follow pattern.
    AcknowledgedResponse resumeFollow​(ResumeFollowRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options)
    Instructs a follower index to resume the following of a leader index.
    org.elasticsearch.client.Cancellable resumeFollowAsync​(ResumeFollowRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options, org.elasticsearch.action.ActionListener<AcknowledgedResponse> listener)
    Asynchronously instruct a follower index to resume the following of a leader index.
    AcknowledgedResponse unfollow​(UnfollowRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options)
    Instructs a follower index to unfollow and become a regular index.

    Asynchronously instructs a follower index to unfollow and become a regular index.

      public PutFollowResponse putFollow​(PutFollowRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options) throws java.io.IOException

      options - the request options (e.g. headers), use RequestOptions.DEFAULT if nothing needs to be customized
      Returns:

    • unfollow

      public AcknowledgedResponse unfollow​(UnfollowRequest request, org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions options) throws java.io.IOException
      Instructs a follower index to unfollow and become a regular index. Note that index following needs to be paused and the follower index needs to be closed. See the docs for more.
      Parameters:
      request - the request
      options - the request options (e.g. headers), use RequestOptions.DEFAULT if nothing needs to be customized
      Returns:
      the response
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - in case there is a problem sending the request or parsing back the response

      Asynchronously instructs a follower index to unfollow and become a regular index. Note that index following needs to be paused and the follower index needs to be closed. See the docs for more.
      Parameters:
      request - the request
      options - the request options (e.g. headers), use RequestOptions.DEFAULT if nothing needs to be customized
